item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life isn't finding shelter in the storm. It's about learning to dance in the rain." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I don't suffer from my insanity -- I enjoy every minute of it." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Just because you can doesn't mean you should." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "She didn't understand that. "How can anyone be afraid of love?" "How can they not?" His face was completely aghast. "When you love someone... truly love them, friend or lover, you lay your heart open to them. You give them a part of yourself that you give to no one else, and you let them inside a part of you that only they can hurt—you literally hand them the razor with a map of where to cut deepest and most painfully on your heart and soul. And when they do strike, it's crippling—like having your heart carved out. It leaves you naked and exposed, wondering what you did to make them want to hurt you so badly when all you did was love them. What is so wrong with you that no one can keep faith with you? That no one can love you? To have it happen once is bad enough... but to have it repeated? Who in their right mind would not be terrified of that?" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "It's easy to look at people and make quick judgments about them, their present and their past, but you'd be amazed at the pain and tears a single smile hides. What a person shows to the world is only one tiny facet of the iceberg hidden from sight. And more often then not, it's lined with cracks and scars that go all the way to the foundation of their soul." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description:
"Oh God, I just kissed a vampire!"
Oh Gods, I just kissed a human!" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description:
"Relax. You're in good hands. Tabby wont hurt you.
She stabbed me!
Damn! I told her not to stab any more Hunters. I hate it when she does that." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life is a tapestry woven by the decisions we make." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "If you love something, set it free. If it comes back, it was, and always will be yours. If it never returns, it was never yours to begin with." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Bitch please...you haven't seen mean yet." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I wasn't born, I was unleashed." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "When you love someone, truly love them, you lay your heart open to them. You give them a part of yourself that you give to no one else, and you let them inside a part of you that only they can hurt-you literally hand them the razor with a map of where to cut deepest and most painfully on your heart and soul. And when they do strike, it’s crippling-like having your heart carved out." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Let me BBQ the red headed bitch goddess - Simi" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Over, under, around, or through. There is always a way. - Soteria" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Dev-"Come in peace or leave in pieces" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "You'd be surprised how many people in the modern age no longer fear zombies as much as teletubies." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "He who lets fear rule him, has fear for a master [Acheron]" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Nick - Psycho-ass? You're bringing psycho-ass back? Zarek - That's Mister Psycho-ass to you, punk." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Only a fool took a remote from a god." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "What are you doing? (Amanda) I'm getting into my car. (Kyrian) You own this?! (Amanda) No. I'm stealing it with the key in my hand. (Kyrian)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "Life is nothing without a little chaos to make it interesting." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "Love is the strongest emotion any creature can feel except for hate, but hate can't hurt you. Love, and trust, and friendship, and all the other emotions humans value so much, are the only emotions that can bring pain. Only love can break a heart into so many pieces. " -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "I'm standing in a slaughterhouse where the cattle are begging to become hamburgers. I have a right to be jumpy." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "A story isn't a charcoal sketch, where every stroke lies on the surface to be seen. It's an oil painting, filled with layers that the author must uncover so carefully to show its beauty." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "What one person does, several people usually consider." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "Only love can break a heart into so many pieces. -Risika(In The Forest Of The Night)" -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "Nesara. So dance." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "We are not. We never were; we never shall be. We return to the void we never, for mehay is the center of all, and all is the center of nothing." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: jennyp9106 add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "What could a mortal say to the merciless Fate? I forced myself to my feet. <i>A'le-Ahnleh</i> was the traditional end to a prayer. By the will of Fate. "<i>A'le-la,</i>" I whispered defiantly. By <i>my</i> will." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
